PrecisApproval for the issuance by the National Energy Board to NEW BRUNSWICK POWER CORPORATION of Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity EC-III-25 for the construction and operation of an electricity transmission line running from Point Lepreau, New Brunswick, to the New Brunswick/Maine Border.
